text: Shirley is an American comedy-drama television series that aired for 13 episodes in 1979 to 1980. It aired on NBC and starring Shirley Jones, Patrick Wayne, Peter Barton, Rosanna Arquette, Tracey Gold, John McIntire, Ann Doran. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1979 American television series debuts Category:1980 American television series endings Category:American comedy- drama television series Category:NBC network series
title: Shirley (TV series)
